name: Mom
status: Busy, but always here for you ‚ù§Ô∏è

messages.text: Hey Mom, how are you?
I'm good, dear. How's everything going?
I lost Mittens üò¢
Oh no! What happened?
She ran out when I opened the door! I can't find her.
Did you check under the bushes?
Yes, I looked everywhere! I think she‚Äôs hiding.
Maybe she‚Äôs just exploring the neighborhood.
I really hope so. She's been gone for 3 hours!
She'll come back, don't worry. Cats always do.
I hope so. I‚Äôll keep an eye out. üôÅ
Keep me posted! I‚Äôm sure she‚Äôll be fine.
I‚Äôm thinking about putting her favorite treat outside.
That‚Äôs a good idea. Cats love their treats.
Thanks, Mom. I‚Äôll keep you updated!

name: Dad
status: Just trying to relax for once üòå

messages.text: Hey Dad, what's up?
Just finished work, finally!
I can't find Mittens! She‚Äôs missing!
Oh no! When did she go missing?
She ran out this afternoon when I opened the door.
Did you check the yard?
Yes, I‚Äôve checked the whole yard. She‚Äôs nowhere to be found.
Maybe she‚Äôs hiding somewhere. Have you tried calling her?
I called her name, but no answer.
She‚Äôs probably just exploring. Don‚Äôt worry.
I hope you‚Äôre right. It‚Äôs been a few hours now.
You should leave some food outside. She might smell it.
Great idea! I‚Äôll try that.
Let me know if she comes back.
I will! Thanks, Dad.
Yo, what‚Äôs up?
Nothing much, just chilling. What's going on?
I can‚Äôt find Mittens anywhere!
What do you mean? Like, gone missing?
Yeah, she ran out of the house a few hours ago.
Did you check the neighborhood?
Yeah, I‚Äôve checked all around. No sign of her.
She‚Äôs probably just roaming around. Cats do that.
I hope so. I‚Äôm getting worried.
Have you tried calling her name?
Yeah, but nothing. It‚Äôs like she‚Äôs vanished.
Bro, relax. Cats come back eventually.
I know. I just don‚Äôt want anything to happen to her.
Try putting some food outside. That might bring her back.
Good idea! I‚Äôll do that now. Thanks.

Hello, this is Jothan. My cat, Mittens, is missing, and I need your help to find her. She went missing on December 16th at around 2:30 PM. I‚Äôve looked everywhere around the house and outside, but I can‚Äôt find her.
Thank you for reaching out. We're sorry to hear about Mittens. Could you provide more details about her so we can assist in finding her?

Sure! She‚Äôs a small, light gray tabby cat with distinct white markings on her paws and chest. She has bright green eyes and a pink collar with a little bell. I‚Äôve attached a recent photo of her so you can recognize her easily.
https://www.catster.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Tabby-cat-looking-up-with-long-whiskers_Krysten-Merriman_Pexels.jpg
Thank you for the details. We‚Äôll keep an eye out for her. Can you provide the exact area where she was last seen?
She was last seen near the front yard, just outside the house. We live on Maple Street, near the corner of Oak Avenue. There‚Äôs a small park nearby, and she loves to wander there sometimes.
Got it! We‚Äôll send officers to check the area around Maple Street and the park. In the meantime, make sure to leave some food outside in case she returns on her own.
Thank you! I‚Äôve also posted about her on social media and informed my neighbors. Please let me know if you get any updates.
We‚Äôll be sure to update you if we find any leads. Rest assured, we‚Äôll do everything we can to help bring Mittens home.
Thank you so much for your help! I appreciate it.
Hey sis, what's up?
Hey! Just relaxing. What‚Äôs going on?
I can‚Äôt find Mittens anywhere!
What? She‚Äôs missing?
Yeah! She ran out when I opened the door.
Oh no, that‚Äôs not good. Have you checked the backyard?
Yes, I‚Äôve checked everywhere. I‚Äôm really worried.
Maybe she‚Äôs just hiding. Cats do that sometimes.
I hope so. It‚Äôs been hours now.
She‚Äôll come back. Just give it time.
I think I‚Äôll leave some food outside for her.
Good idea! She might smell it and come back.
Thanks for the advice! I‚Äôll try that.
Let me know if she returns!
Will do! Fingers crossed. ü§û
Oye! Kya scene chal raha?
Kya baat hai! Bas chill hoon. Tu?
Same yaar, bas thoda bore ho raha hoon.
Haan, wahi. Kuch interesting batana!
Interesting? Hmm, accha sun, tumhe pata hai, dolphins ke paas names hote hain?
Kya? Dolphins naam bhi rakhti hain? üò±
Haan yaar, ek dusre ko call karte hain apne naam se!
Matlab dolphin ki apni ‚Äúidentity crisis‚Äù? üòÜ
Haha, exactly! üòÇ
Matlab, apni hi language mein hi mast chal raha hai.
Arre, tumne yeh suna tha? Agar bees ko pyaas lage toh woh udh nahi sakte!
Kya? Bees ko udne ka pyaas se kya lena dena? üòÜ
Haan! Pyaas lag gayi toh gir jaati hain. Nature ke laws, bhai!
Aree yaar, yeh kaunse padhayi ka chapter tha! üòÖ
Yaar, tumhe pata hai crocodiles kabhi khud ko chhupake bhi rakhte hain?
Matlab apne ghar ke under? üòú
Haan! Nature mein sab ka style alag hai!
Bindaas! Croc bhi apni privacy chahta hai. üòÇ
Waise, woh black holes ke baare mein suna?
Kya black holes? Bina jaane humne nahi jaana! üòú
Matlab, woh kuch cheezon ko kha jaate hain aur light tak nahi nikalne dete.
Kya? Matlab black hole bhi apni ‚Äúbillionaire‚Äù lifestyle jeeta hai! üòÇ
Haha, exactly! Bohat hi greedy hote hain.
Waise, tumne kabhi sunha hai ki cats apne owner ko yeh samajh kar pyaar karti hain ki wo unke ‚Äúservants‚Äù hain? üòÜ
Kya! Cats ka bhi apna ‚Äúmaster-servant‚Äù system?
Bilkul! Pyaar karte hain, par apni convenience ke liye! üòπ
Yaar, tumne yeh suna? Kuch birds apni ‚Äúmating dance‚Äù ke liye, diamond ya glass collect karte hain!
Arey yaar, toh yeh hain apne bird version ke ‚Äúgold diggers‚Äù! üíé
Hahaha! Bilkul! Ab tumhe lag raha hai ki kuch birds humse zyada stylish hain!
Haan yaar, unki life style se sab seekhna chahiye!
Sahi pakde hain! Waise tumhare sabse weird dream kya tha?
Ek baar dream mein main swimming pool mein tha aur jellyfish ke saath dance kar raha tha. üòÇ
Hahahaha, jellyfish ke saath party!
Arre, dream mein toh sab chal raha hota hai! üòÜ
Sach hai yaar, aise dreams hamesha best hote hain!
Waise, kabhi socha hai, animals ki duniya mein sabse intelligent kaun?
Chimpanzees? üòú
Haan, bilkul! Aur woh apne tools bhi banate hain!
Bindaas! Koi kitna bhi smart ho, monkey toh sab pe bhaari hai! üêí
Haha! Yaar, ab soch raha hoon main bhi monkey ke jaise kuch naya try karoon! üòé
Kya? Tum bhi? Yaar, tumhe toh idea aa gaya!
Haan, monkey ki tarah hangout karo, aur ideas lo! üòÇ
Agle weekend, monkey ki tarah chalte hain sab! üêµ
Best idea! Waise, tumhe pata hai ki kisi bhi dog ka bark ki frequency actually human ear se alag hoti hai!
Kya! Dogs ke bhi apni secret frequencies hoti hain! üêï
Haan, aur unko sun ke hum samajh nahi paate.
Ab hum bhi unki frequency pe ‚Äúevolve‚Äù karna padega! üòÇ
Exactly! Uske baad toh, dogs ko samajhna hi asaan hoga.
Morning, sunshine! üåû How‚Äôs my favorite girl today?
Good morning, my love! ‚ù§Ô∏è Aaj toh thoda mood off hai‚Ä¶
What happened? ü§î Talk to me.
Bas yaar, thoda thaka feel ho raha hoon. Lagta hai tumhare bina zindagi kuch khaali hai üòî
Aww, don't be sad. I‚Äôm here. Tumhare saath hoon, toh sab theek ho jaayega üíñ
Mujhe tumhari yaad aayi thi, bas. Ab thoda better feel kar rahi hoon.
Hmmm... okay, let's make this day better! Aaj kuch mazedaar karte hain!
Hmmm, mazedaar? Tumhare saath sab kuch mazedaar hota hai! üòò
Woh toh hai! Tumhare saath toh boring bhi fun lagta hai! üòú
Haha, seriously! Agar tum saath ho, toh din kaun boring feel karega? üòâ
By the way, kal tumne jo mujhe message bheja tha, thoda confusing tha‚Ä¶ ü§î
Arre, woh? Mujhe laga tum samjh gaye ho. Tumhare liye toh main hamesha confuse hi hoon!
Confused? Aur tum dono kaise ho? ü§£ Anyway, sab samajh gaya tha.
Aww, I was just testing you. Tum toh sab kuch samajh jaate ho! üòâ
Chalo, ek kaam karo, mujhe ek sweet message bhejo, I need that energy today! ‚ù§Ô∏è
You are the best part of my life. Tumhare bina kuch bhi bekaar hai. Love you forever! üíï
I swear, tum itni sweet ho, mujhe diabetes ho jaayegi! üòÜ
Hahaha, is that a good thing or a bad thing? üòú
Totally good! You‚Äôre the sweetest thing in my life. ü•∫
Aww, stop making me blush. üò≥
Okay, now stop being cute‚Ä¶ you‚Äôll make my heart skip a beat. ‚ù§Ô∏è
I can‚Äôt stop being cute if I try, babe. üòè
Okay, serious mode now. Kabhi galti se bhi mujhe ignore mat karna, samjhi?
What? Main tumhe ignore karoon? Never! üò§ Tumse door jaana mere liye possible hi nahi.
That's better! I can‚Äôt live without you either. ‚ù§Ô∏è
You‚Äôre mine forever, and I‚Äôm yours. No one can change that. üíç
By the way, ab aaj tumse milne ka wait nahi ho raha. Jitna time tumhare saath bitana chahoon, utna nahi milta! üò≠
Mujhe bhi! Tum se milke aisa lagta hai jaise duniya ki saari khushiyan mere paas ho. üíñ
Stop it, ab mujhe tumse milke kisi aur duniya mein jaana hai! üòÇ
Hahaha, okay fine, let's meet soon! Tumne bola toh, everything's possible! üòò
But yaar, one thing. Tum khud ko itna cute kyun banati ho? üòÖ
Main cute na hoti toh tumhe kaise apne saath rakhti? üòâ
Touch√©! You win again! üòú
Haha, yeh toh hona hi tha! Tum se better kya expect kar sakti ho? üòé
Okay, wait! Mujhe lagta hai tum thoda over sweet ho gayi ho aaj! üòú
Over sweet? Nah! Main toh bas tumhe apne pyaar mein dooba rahi hoon. üíñ
Tumhara pyaar toh main kab se dooba hoon! üòå
Meri jaan! Ab zyada pyaar karogi, toh main toh waise hi pyaar se mar jaungi! üòò
Meri jaan, tumse pyaar karna mera kaam hai. Tumhare bina kuch bekaar hai! üòî
Aww, ab aise mat kehna. Tumhare bina meri zindagi ka koi matlab nahi! üíì
Promise karna tum hamesha mere saath rahoge, chahe kuch ho jaaye?
Promise. Tum hi toh ho mera sab kuch. Tumse door jaane ka sochna bhi impossible hai! üíï
I love you more than anything in this world. üòò
